paragraph.paragraph:
Adding project references to EiffelEnvision project is done in the same manner as adding references to any Visual Studio .NET project. To add an Assembly, COM or Project reference to an EiffelEnvision project:
Highlight the project you want to add reference(s) to, in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htmSolution Explorer.
Select the Project, Add Reference from the main menu
The Visual Studio .NET ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/urfAddReferenceDialogBox.htmAdd Reference Dialog Box will then appear.
Add the appropriate references and click Ok. For more information about the common way of adding references in Visual Studio .NET, see ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vbcon/html/vbtskAddingRemovingReferences.htmAdding and Removing References.

EiffelEnvision supports an additional type of assembly reference used exclusively by other EiffelEnvision projects - Precompiled Library Reference. These are special EiffelEnvision projects, creatable using the ../../adding_projects/index.xmlEiffel Class Library (Precompiled) Project. EiffelEnvision projects should not reference other EiffelEnvision projects or assemblies created using EiffelEnvision. ../../../../eiffel_for_dotnet/index.xmlEiffel for .NET supports features that are not present in the Common Language Runtime (CLR) and must compensate for this. As a result, making use of assemblies created using ../../../../eiffel_for_dotnet/index.xmlEiffel for .NET require additional compilation information. For detailed information on this, see precompiled_libraries.xmlPrecompiled Libraries.

EiffelEnvision projects can only reference one precompiled library at one time. To add a precompile library reference, set the ../project_configuration/precompiled.xmlprecompiled_libraryPrecompiled Library project configuration property. Once set, provided the precompiled library is compatible with the current version of EiffelEnvision, the precompiled assembly will show up under the ../../structure/references/references_folder.xmlReferences Folder.
